item.description:
Come down to Edgewood Yacht Club to watch the FIFA World Cup Championships!

This is an informal gathering of EYC members and friends in the almost-finished Darby Room!

So come down and join us for some cool breezes and cheer
on the water in Cranston,
and hang for a beer.

Game time is 2:30,
arrive early or late,
keep in mind this is a private club,
so please be somewhat sedate. ;-)

Bring a dish to share,
perhaps a comfortable chair,
kick back and enjoy the mid-summer air.

The bar will be open!

Hope to see you there!

Ok, enough with the rhyming - I'm definitely NOT Dr. Seuss! ;-)

(photo courtesy of Bill Toomey)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a blue or brown T-shirt, its too hot for a scarf!
item.name: FIFA World Cup Championships at EYC!
